long_description: The Petzl Bolsa Rope Bag is designed to store your climbing rope along with some gear while allowing you to move quickly and comfortably on your hike in to the crag. The Bolsa is a lightweight rope bag for comfortably carrying a rope of up to 80m, plus climbing gear. Practical and easy to use, the Bolsa bag has a rope tarp integrated into the bag, providing a clean area of 55 x 55 in. and a place to easily store the rope. Tarp protects the rope from dirt, leaves and gravel; after climbing, the rope is easy to stack on the tarp and store in the bag. 2 different colored loops on the tarp help you identify the ends of the rope and keep the rope from tangling. Adjustable shoulder straps for greater comfort when moving around; bag can be carried bandolier style over 1 shoulder. Petzl Bolsa Rope Bag has a zipper for opening and closing.
short_description: The Petzl Bolsa Rope Bag is designed to store your climbing rope along with some gear while allowing you to move quickly and comfortably on your hike in to the crag.
